name: CNAuthorizationStatus
desc: An authorization status the user can grant for an app to access the specified entity type.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The user has not yet made a choice regarding whether the application may access contact data.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: The application is not authorized to access contact data. The user cannot change this applicationâ€™s status, possibly due to active restrictions such as parental controls being in place.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user explicitly denied access to contact data for the application.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The application is authorized to access contact data.
